ingredients: 2 cups salsa verde, such as 16-ounce jar Frontera tomatillo sauce
2 cups salsa verde, such as 16-ounce jar Frontera tomatillo sauce
2½ cups shredded or diced cooked chicken
8 ounces Cheddar, Monterey Jack or Pepper Jack cheese (half shredded; half sliced)
¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro, divided use
4 or 5 large pimento-stuffed green olives, sliced
3 large radishes, trimmed, halved and sliced
